html:
8.19.20  6:13 pm   whats a better word to use besides music 'theory'

      escape room

8.19.20  5:38 pm   when is your next video planned to come out?

      i can't tell you

8.19.20  5:00 pm   What's the best shrek movie

      Shrekelback, the adventures Chad Krogre

8.19.20  4:48 pm   Hi Bill, I am running out of time. What if I cannot wait to want it badder and badder until I become desperate enough to actually follow through?

      then you can relax. you don't have to do it

8.19.20  4:38 pm   what's your most vivid memory?

      reading this question

8.19.20  3:40 pm   does your lyrics always have an idea behind it?  

      sometimes the lyric may be actually INSIDE the idea, and also laced with a generous dousing of feeling

8.19.20  3:15 pm   how familiar are you with DAWs? i want to start making music with Studio One 4 but the whole interface is in hieroglyphics for me. also how long did it take for you to get familiar with DAWs? do you have any tips? also i hope you're having a nice day

     first thing you wanna do is find the play button, the record button, and the export button. everything expands outward from there

8.19.20  3:03 pm   How do you change the pace of a song so smoothly?

      it's like having a pet..... except not the kind that ever wants to do what you tell it

8.19.20  2:42 pm   every time i try to write a new melody, i end up starting it with some variation of 5-2-1 (e.g. B3-F#4-E4). obviously there are different ways to start a melody. what are your favorites? 

      a different one than i used last time

8.19.20  2:38 pm   how do I start music?

      i'm not sure. music is a prankster. you may realize you have already started it. at least that's i think the way it went for me

8.19.20  1:41 pm   Are you making a huge video?

      no, but i'll try to make each one as big as i can

8.19.20  1:13 pm   Whatever happened to the guy that flew into the sun in one of your videos

      it's me and the story takes place now

8.19.20  12:56 pm   what is your preferred method of serving eggs?

      sitting on them until they hatch

8.19.20  12:32 pm   what are some lesser known instruments that you've used in your songs?

      jeans,

8.19.20  11:53 am   hey, bill. what is the practical use of a rubber duck?

      troubleshoot a complex problem by trying to explain the entire problem to the duck. the duck won't care that much, but you will realize the solution to your problem

8.19.20  11:34 am   I have a place, but I want to put a thing in it, what should I put in the place?

      how about yourself

8.19.20  11:32 am   do you like bagels

      sometimes i use them as a pillow

8.19.20  11:24 am   why are you only answering on the 8th day of any month?

     i answer questions every day, but i think what's happening is you are only logging on to the internet on the 8th day of any month

     is the 8th magic?

     yes but so are the other days as well, both on and off line

8.19.20  11:20 am   do you have more serious music projects and/or projects that we don't see because they don't match the style you're known for? (not to suggest that your normal music is bad! it's real good!)

      when you're only 1 person, it's actually the opposite problem. you have to do everything in your power to make sure everything is different enough. because things will have a tendency to sound like always the same exact person. To actually discard things because they are not close enough to what's already been done, that would be the opposite of what you'd want to do. out here scrambling to grasp on to every drop of different i can possibly muster, you see

8.19.20  11:17 am   Hey Bill,sorry to bother, but whats your thoughts on people imitating youre beautiful astethic of music? 

      instead of thinking about that, i am supposed to be creating the next aesthetic for them to copy. or else the whole system falls out of line

8.19.20  10:56 am   would you advise beginner songmakers to make a lot of songs quickly or work really hard on each song and not make as many songs?

      i think make a lot of songs quickly. if you go in for the huge songs before you know what you're doing, you may feel like giving up very quickly. Actually in general, there seems to be a sort of time limit for how much time you can spend on songs before they lose all feeling

8.19.20  10:41 am   What's the best way to learn something new?

      be it

8.19.20  10:22 am   Procrastination is my worst enemy. Are you still sticking to that timer you made or did you decide  to push your next video to a later date?

      the timer was never based on a date. the timer was more of an intimidating stare. now, however, there is a date. but i can't say it because if i'm wrong then i will get clobbered twice. just the one self-clobber is bad enough, in those situations

8.19.20  10:18 am   have you ever been stuck like writer's block but with chords? i have tried but i cant break from the standard 4 chords thing

also te amo ty

      ah, i think i can proudly announce the exact remedy for this, which is WORDS AND SITUATIONS. or, another way to think of it, ..... "non-chords."
     chords love non-chords, so much.
     all you gotta do is just put a bunch of non-chords on the table, and chords will flock to the scene. it's like magic
     and, contrarily, if you forget to put any non-chords on the table, the chords will never show up.

8.19.20  10:12 am   Im going to write a one word song, what should said word be?

      are you asking me to write your entire song for you

8.19.20  9:37 am   what is the most random thing you can do

      whatever the computer chooses, randomly, from a pre-determined list

8.19.20  9:24 am   Do you think you have to have strong musical theory knowledge in order to break the rules in compelling ways?

      the rules already are broken in compelling ways. if you think you are trying to learn some 'music theory', you might be frustrated and feel like you are falling flat on your face because of how often the rules break and re-write themselves. So actually the rules will be broken along the way, dozens of times, on any road to knowledge

8.19.20  9:11 am   any ideas you've scrapped?

      being an idiot. but the idea keeps coming back

8.19.20  7:55 am   judging by your videos, you may have been gifted with synesthesia (percieving certain frequencies/instruments as colours or shapes internally), that helps you put out into your videos. is my assumption right?

     i don't think so. but i think all of those things (notes, shapes, colors,) are WILD anyway, without having to be confused with each other

8.19.20  7:44 am   8.19.20  12:43 am so is la de da de da de da de day oh considered one word or multiple words

      that phrase, i would consider more like notes really. but that song, ........ has to be at least 100 words or maybe more

8.19.20  6:30 am   hi bill whose ur musical inspirations? for me it's you haha

      everyone is so good and bad it's overwhelming some times. i prefer to think of it as a collage. so i suppose the collage would have to have a warning label; MAY CONTAIN EVERYTHING

8.19.20  5:15 am   Do you ever post a video you don't like, but put lots of effort into it?

      the only way that could happen is if it was in the opposite order from what you said. but even so, hopefully that doesn't really happen

8.19.20  5:08 am   What is in the program notes that damien maymdien skips in the vid 'maybe i could eat blades of grass'?

      this question

8.19.20  4:52 am   did you go to college for music or are you self taught?

      i self taught myself many many years before i would have been any where near old enough to attend college. but then i kept teaching myself that and more things, all the way up until the present day. i even taught myself to do my own laundry, if you can believe that

8.19.20  4:52 am   Hey I want to make music. I already do, I've been for years, but I suck at all musical instruments I've tried at (for years), and at making music too. I'm very stressed by my personal and education stuff and as a result I always feel tired, leaving me with no energy to focus on any instrument enough to actually improve. Usually I play whatever I feel like, mess around which can be fun but on non-polyphonic instruments gets boring quickly.

     ah yes, i could see that

     Also I suspect that this way I'm discouraged from trying new things (because in the beginning they won't be fun, as I will fail at them over and over again),

     i'd say you won't even know how fun the game can be until you get some chords into your life SOMEHOW

     so I don't improve. As you see I'm kinda desperate, but that desperation isn't good enough of a fuel: I've attempted a serious approach, playing exercises from a book everyday but after a month the results were scarce, then I was forced to slow down and now I'm back at the beginning again. Back at pointless wankery too. I don't really believe I'm gonna make it anymore. I'm thinking of quitting, and not just music. But that's just awful and I can't. I'm stuck, I don't know what to do. I've written folk tales, that didn't help. Maybe I should do something else, but at this point I've given too much to let go, and anyway if I'm this obsessed it's because I've had fun sometines, both listening, making and playing music. But it seems emotions vanish when I need them the most

      ah, right. you are seeing the mischievous nature of music. (well, not just music, ........ sometimes it seems almost everything in the world is that way, but that's another story).
      You could think of it like a playful pet, or friend.
     it honestly really likes you. you just have to be gentle and friendly with it.
     it will find you anyway. might even be fun to try to ignore it for a second and see if it comes bounding back clamoring for your attention

8.19.20  4:14 am   do you see yourself making music just like "monday candle trivia"?

      sure, i did it then, and at least a couple of other times. and more times in the future, for sure. but hopefully a little bit different, as usual

8.19.20  3:43 am   hi Bill!! i noticed that there are those who are complimenting you for your positive impact on their lives so i thought i could join along; your advice to me on 6.23.18 11:29pm (2 years ago!) was very helpful. I have gained many experiences and i grow better and better with each experience i gained. this is just a reminder that youre aWesOmE, aMaZinG and aStrOnOmIcaL and dont tell yourself otherwise :^)) 

      holy high speed underground worldwide food supply shipping route(s), you are very friendly

8.19.20  3:40 am   Why do i occasionally feel exhausted and think to myself "f this place, f this job, f everyone. imma be a trucker"? Is it normal?

     yes

      Have you ever felt that way?

      similar

8.19.20  3:34 am   Hey Bill! I wanted to know if you have any thoughts on how to overcome a fear of performing/sharing one's music

      impossible really. you just have to want it so badly that you can't take it anymore, and still it will kind of feel like jumping off a cliff. but not as dangerous. more like getting into a very very very very cold pool

8.19.20  3:32 am   Your music and even this website is so creative and seems to have so many random things strewn about, yet it is all organized and meaningful in its own different way. How did you start doing this unique style, and how do you keep it going?

      i must have had a traumatizing epiphany somewhere along the line, realizing that everything is itself

8.19.20  2:23 am   thoughts on grass?

      exciting. grows very fast. good thing to watch, if sports are ever cancelled

8.19.20  1:53 am   would you like to make a band?

      yes

8.19.20  1:44 am   What is your favorite kinda drum stick? Idk I don't know music lol.

      5a, wood tip

8.19.20  1:11 am   Would you agree there are.only two types of song?

     no

     Songs about love and songs about L O V E

8.19.20  1:02 am   Im looking to get back into playing the saxophone but I haven't played it for 7+ years do you have any tips for geting back into hobbys you haven't done for many year's?

      first, try it for an hour and see if anything goes wrong. it's too early to ask for tips now because you haven't even tried yet

8.19.20  12:43 am   hey i want to make music, but i don't know where to start. i can play guitar and bass and some other instruments but i don't know how to start off with making a song. how do i start off?

      start by making a song that's just 1 word

8.19.20  12:21 am   i just wanted to say i appreciate the fact that you are very human. the way you present yourself, this website, everything. i appreciate SO MUCH the fact that i can tell you made everything yourself, and that i'm interacting with a human right now. i don't know how to say this. just, that basically everyone else on the internet exudes a barrier of Marketing Firms and Advertising Agencies in between them and their audience and somehow you discovered that it was very possible and easy to subvert all of that but nobody else thought of doing it.

do you like pancakes (conceptually)?

      yes

8.18.20  11:57 pm   are you working on a new song?

      yes

8.18.20  11:27 pm   Can we get an update on Steve from the hi I'm Steve video, I worry about his well being

      i don't believe you

8.18.20  11:19 pm   Have you ever counted how many jingles are in your 'history of the world/japan' videos?

      yes
